title: Need some Serif inspiration...
content:
Im looking for some serif font inspiration for a identity job

At the moment im using Amasis:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=Amasis](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906162147/http:/www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=Amasis "http://www.myfonts.com/search?search%5Btext%5D=Amasis")

but am looking to put together about 6 different options...

Does anyone know of that fantastic long forgotten serif font that  
can be dragged out and used again, or have any other suggestions  
on great serif typefaces ? The letter A is quite important in the identity...

i also like...

Goudy Old Style  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/goudy-old-style/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906162147/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/goudy-old-style/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/goudy-old-style/")

Silverado RR Light  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/silverado-rr/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906162147/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/silverado-rr/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/redrooster/silverado-rr/")

Thanks

 [‹ D&AD competitions](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906162147/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39164 "Go to previous forum topic") [Times Modern Typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080906162147/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39411 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Ans

comments.content:
Under my eyes, Amasis is more a slab than a serif.

i think Goody Old Style and Silverado have in common a very “oldstyle” look, they sound out of date.

consider le monde livre, angie, bullen, collis, fedra serif, charter, maiola, goodchild, the serif... these are contemporary, they have a personnality, some are real serif, some are slab.

dr

Schneidler? Joanna?

Conga Brava can be interesting in a way, although it’s almost italics :)

hey you know what? I was actually going to name Joanna, then I thought I should focus on the contemporary ones. But Joanna rocks.

dr

Hey, Thanks for your help... Charter it is, fits the bill well  
Thanks Again  
Andz
